mapper.select: SELECT iam_member_role.source_id, iam_member_role.source_type, iam_permission.id, iam_permission.code, iam_permission.path, iam_permission.method FROM iam_member_role INNER JOIN iam_role_permission ON iam_member_role.role_id = iam_role_permission.role_id INNER JOIN iam_role ON iam_role.id = iam_member_role.role_id AND iam_role.is_enabled = 1 INNER JOIN iam_permission ON iam_role_permission.permission_id = iam_permission.id AND iam_permission.fd_level = iam_member_role.source_type WHERE iam_member_role.member_type = 'user' AND iam_permission.public_access = 0 AND iam_permission.login_access = 0 AND iam_permission.within=0 AND iam_member_role.member_id = #{userId} AND iam_permission.service_name = #{serviceName}

SELECT iam_permission.id, iam_permission.code, iam_permission.path, iam_permission.method, iam_permission.public_access, iam_permission.login_access FROM iam_permission WHERE iam_permission.service_name = #{serviceName} AND (iam_permission.public_access = 1 OR iam_permission.login_access = 1) AND iam_permission.within=0
SELECT iam_permission.path, iam_permission.method FROM iam_permission WHERE iam_permission.service_name = #{serviceName} AND iam_permission.within = 1
